## Client.changeSyncMode() method

`changeRealtimeSync` changes the synchronization mode of the given document.

**Signature:**

```typescript
changeSyncMode<T, P extends Indexable>(doc: Document<T, P>, syncMode: SyncMode): Promise<Document<T, P>>;
```
